title: Neuberger Berman Announces Close of $7.3 Billion Private Debt V - PR Newswire
summary:
NEW YORK, Nov. 11, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Neuberger Berman, a global, private, employee-owned investment manager, is pleased to announce the final close of NB Private Debt V (the "Fund").
"We are deeply grateful for our investors' ongoing trust and support," said Susan Kasser, Head of Neuberger Berman Private Debt.
About Neuberger Berman Neuberger Berman is an employee-owned, private, independent investment manager founded in 1939 with 2900 employees in 26 countries.
About Neuberger Private Markets Neuberger Private Markets is a division of Neuberger Berman and has been an active and successful private markets investor since 1987.
As of September 30, 2025 Neuberger Private Markets manages over $169 billion of investor commitments across primaries, co-investments, secondaries, private credit, and specialty strategies.

title: Heron Finance and Inspira Financial Deliver Institutional-Grade Custody for Private Credit Investors - PR Newswire
summary:
SAN FRANCISCO, Nov. 11, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Heron Finance and Inspira Financial are joining forces to elevate protection of private credit assets for accredited investors, family offices, and financial advisors.
"We're excited to work with Heron Finance, combining Inspira's custodial expertise with Heron's mission to expand access to institutional-grade private market investments.
About Heron Finance Heron Finance is a private credit investment platform serving accredited investors, RIAs, and family offices.
Heron Finance and Inspira Financial are not affiliated.
Media Contact: [email protected] SOURCE Heron Finance

title: Private Credit's Public Market Permeation Is a Key '2026' Risk, UBS Says - Yahoo Finance
summary:
"Our view is essentially that you now have private credit that has permeated public credit.
The two are essentially interconnected," says Matthew Mish, head of public and private credit strategy at UBS Securities.
"We believe that it is a key risk for 2026 and beyond," he says during an interview on Bloomberg Television.
Recommended Stories

title: Heron Finance and Inspira Financial Deliver Institutional-Grade Custody for Private Credit Investors - Yahoo Finance
summary:
SAN FRANCISCO, Nov. 11, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Heron Finance and Inspira Financial are joining forces to elevate protection of private credit assets for accredited investors, family offices, and financial advisors.
"We're excited to work with Heron Finance, combining Inspira's custodial expertise with Heron's mission to expand access to institutional-grade private market investments.
About Heron Finance Heron Finance is a private credit investment platform serving accredited investors, RIAs, and family offices.
By building custom, diversified portfolios from institutional-quality private credit funds, Heron helps clients access income-producing assets without the complexity or opacity of public market wrappers.
Heron Finance and Inspira Financial are not affiliated.

title: UK banks push for easing of capital rules to counter surge in private credit - Financial Times
summary:
British banks are losing ground to less constrained private credit groups and Wall Street rivals, two bosses have claimed to senior lawmakers.
This has prompted concern among regulators, who have less oversight of private credit groups, as well as among bankers.
“There is a considerable difference between lending into the private credit fund on that diversification and securitisation basis versus lending directly to the client itself,” he said.
Roberts said US deregulation would increase pressure on UK authorities to ease rules for British banks.
Roberts called on regulators to force private credit groups to disclose much more information.

title: Robinhood CEO Says Tokenization Will 'Unlock 24/7 Markets' And Investors Will 'Never Go Back' - Benzinga
summary:
Vlad Tenev, the CEO and co-founder of Robinhood Markets Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD), declared that the era of traditional 9-to-5 trading is numbered, predicting that asset tokenization will inevitably lead to 24/7 global markets.
Check out HOOD’s stock price here.
Tokenization Will ‘Unlock 24/7 Markets’ In an X post on Tuesday, Tenev framed the current market structure—which includes closures on weekends and holidays—as a temporary limitation that will soon seem absurd.
The company is already leveraging blockchain technology in Europe to facilitate 24/7 trading and faster settlements, according to Johann Kerbrat, GM of Robinhood Crypto.
See Also: Robinhood To Offer Retail Investors Access To Private AI Companies Despite Bubble Concerns Kraken Follows Suit For Tokenized Stock Trading Robinhood is not alone in this pursuit, as the financial industry increasingly pivots toward tokenized, always-on trading.
